channel.title: Insight Stash - Fast, Simple Feedback forms
channel.description:
Hi Guys, I would like to show you a product i've been working for a while: [Insight Stash](https://insightstash.com).
Insight Stash is a Voice of the Customer service, which allows you to create customized survey forms for your site.
* Fix your conversion flows * Find problems users experience on your site * Get feedback directly from visitors, and improve your business!
Let me know what you think! Stan

item.title: Insight Stash - Fast, Simple Feedback forms
item.dc:creator: Brian_O_Neill
item.description:
Looks nice but there is a lot of competition in this market. I use hotjar myself for this type of thing. Have you considered a free plan to get people on board?

Read full topic
item.source: Insight Stash - Fast, Simple Feedback forms
